ESRI.Configuration.Name: Super Cursor
ESRI.Configuration.Description: ArcGIS Desktop version 10.0+ add-in for editing and querying vector layers.
ESRI.Configuration.Author: Alec Zoeller

Button.caption: Copy as Query
Button.message: Query will be copied to clipboard, can be pasted as definition query.
Button.tip: Click to copy selected features to text query in clipboard.

Button.caption: Delete Features
Button.message: Target layer in dropdown will have all selected features deleted. IF NO FEATURES ARE SELECTED, ALL FEATURES WILL BE DELETED.
Button.tip: Click to delete all selected features in selected layer.

Tool.caption: Add Features
Tool.message: For polyline/polygon, double-click to finish feature.
Tool.tip: Click button and click in canvas to add features to selected layer.

ComboBox.caption: Target Layer
ComboBox.message: After selecting layer, use Selection tool to identify features to query or delete. "Add features" does not require selection.
ComboBox.tip: Select layer to query, add or delete from.
